explains: adj. 感激的，蒙恩的；负债的
v. 使负债；使受恩惠（indebt 的过去式和过去分词形式）

sentences.en: I am deeply indebted to him for his help.
sentences.cn: 我对他的帮助深深感激。

sentences.en: I am deeply indebted to my family for all their help.
sentences.cn: 我深深感激我的家人给我的所有帮助。

sentences.en: The treasury secretary identified the most heavily indebted countries.
sentences.cn: 财政部长明确指出了负债最多的一些国家。
